Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory153.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "After defeating the enemies, we quickly ran up the stairs and went through many battle scenes that didn't really match the background settings."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'These scenes have nothing to do with our main plot!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "I guess Celica only had access to these materials. We're lucky that we aren't stuck. When I watched Kamui play other games...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You are always talking about Kamui.', 3: '7', 4: "Who's better at playing games, you or Kamui?", 5: '8'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Ahem... Not at all. I just happen to inherit all the game-related topics from his memory!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Isn't it obvious? I will never lose to that fool in anything.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Eventually, we jumped across a staircase (broken for no reason) and arrived at a special room.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory170.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'I have been watching you since you approached the castle... You took a long time to get here, heroes.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Apart from some enemies that we previously encountered, there was one figure that gave a very different feel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey, you are the Demon General, aren't you?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera and Camu were ready to start fighting, but Karenina walked forward and triggered the dialogue.'}
{3: "It wasn't because she liked to follow orders, but because she preferred to ask the enemies' names before beating them."}
{3: 'Either way, the enemy would still be beaten up, but at least it felt better than straight-forward violence. '}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: 'Right. I am Demon General Zanzibaron.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zanzibaron—I had no clue where that name came from—moved one step forward, dragging his gigantic body.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: "You must be the heroes in the revelation. I knew you were coming, but I didn't expect you to come so fast.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What are "heroes in the revelation"?', 3: '19', 4: 'Did you know we were coming since the beginning?', 5: '22'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: 'How can you be heroes but not know the legend of the revelation? How did you even get here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Because we skipped the story.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: "In the Goddess' revelation, there would be heroes...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: 'Aye, we Demons rely on our perception to survive...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: '"Survive"? You say it like you are on the brink of extinction.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zanzibaron', 3: 'Right, because...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Stop. I wasn't interested in your story, and I will not listen to it. Learning your name is more than enough!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Well, Karenina was only following her own rules. She forced to start the battle when Zanzibaron was still trying to explain the background settings.'}
{3: "Fusion Dragon smashed on Zanzibaron's face like a giant club."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Camu, are sneak attacks like that allowed in the game?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: '"I don\'t see any problems. That looked like a compulsory battle to me. 【kuroname】, we are about to engage in multiple battles. I assume you will give orders, right?"', 4: '1'}
{2: "I thought you didn't need me.", 3: '32', 4: 'Of course!', 5: '32'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'We can easily tackle the minions, but Boss fight can be very demanding. You do the thinking, we do the action.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Hmph, good to know. It's a Boss after all, we need all the available resources!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Let's do it then!", 4: '1'}
